0.text: Bug 2127  Tasks Cell Editor does not close on deactivation (1GE7AN3).

1.text: I'm not sure if this is a bug.

2.text: It is very strange behavior, though.

4.text: Add a task to the task list.

8.text: While cell editor is active click on navigator.

9.text: Notice activation is now in navigator, but cell editor in task list is still open.

11.text: Click back on title for tasks.

13.text: Move scroll bar up and down.

14.text: Notice how cell editor disappers momentarily while scrolling.

16.text: Now click on column headings to change order.

18.text: The same problem occurs if the priority editor is active.

19.text: Expected behavior:  If I click off the task list the cell editor should be deactivated, as the part itself is deactivated.
